channel.title: linux on Philomath's Lair!
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Philomath's Lair!

item.title: How Linux System Boots up!
item.description: Power on BIOS: points to the bootloader (to multple select OS and to add more features) Loads kernel ​ run level 1: looks for devices through I/O ports (autoprobing) ​ handle control to Init Init Process ​ Check for filesystem and disk failures ​ start several daemons such as www server and print server ​ starts getty program to watch keyboards and mount inputs ​ daemons to support network services and x server.

item.title: Mysterious language of Bash!
item.description: About $# variables and fork bomb in bash How cryptic they are and link to the documentation and stack overflow. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5163144/what-are-the-special-dollar-sign-shell-variables
